text: Hi! How are you doing today?
Good, thanks! How are you?
I am doing well thank you. Do you ever donate to charity?
In the past few years I rarely have.
I know, it can be hard to donate. especially in today's society, but a tiny amount, even less than a dollar, can go a long way
That seems so hard to believe, but I guess lots of pennies still add up!
Exactly, I feel the same way sometimes, but think if everyone in the US gave a nickel, that's over 16 million dollars
Wow, that definitely puts it in perspective!
There are so many charities too, but I believe that children are the future, and we need to do what we can to help them have fulfilling lives
I agree with you!
Have you ever volunteered? It's another way to help without having to spend any money
I have! I used to volunteer often, but I have so little time it feels like now!
Time and money these days can be scarce! But think about the little things you buy, and maybe one week, instead of buying that bad of chips or cup of coffee, donate it to the children
You're right! It doesn't take much sacrifice to think of small ways to help!
And think of all the kiddies you will be helping!
Haha that's true!
do you think you will donate today?
I think so!
How much would you like to donate?
I'm not sure! What is the range of options?
